goal.tools.logging

Class InfoLog

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.logging.LogRecord
      • goal.tools.logging.GOALLogRecord
        • goal.tools.logging.StringsLogRecord
          • goal.tools.logging.InfoLog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class InfoLog
extends StringsLogRecord
    Replacement class for System.out calls. Create a new InfoLog instead of calling System.out.print(). (note that you have to end lines manually)
    Logs all created InfoLogs to a logger, which is available using getLogger().
    Author:
    N.Kraayenbrink
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
